        public void onDestroy()

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(VpnStateService.VpnStateListener listener)
        Register a listener with this Service. We assume this is called from the main thread so no synchronization is happening.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to register

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(VpnStateService.VpnStateListener listener)
        Unregister a listener from this Service.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to unregister

      • getProfile

        public VpnProfile getProfile()
        Get the current VPN profile.
        Returns:
        profile

      • getConnectionID

        public long getConnectionID()
        Get the current connection ID. May be used to track which state changes have already been handled. Is increased when startConnection() is called.
        Returns:
        connection ID

      • getState

        public VpnStateService.State getState()
        Get the current state.
        Returns:
        state

      • getErrorState

        public VpnStateService.ErrorState getErrorState()
        Get the current error, if any.
        Returns:
        error

      • getImcState

        public ImcState getImcState()
        Get the current IMC state, if any.
        Returns:
        imc state

      • getRemediationInstructions

        public java.util.List<RemediationInstruction> getRemediationInstructions()
        Get the remediation instructions, if any.
        Returns:
        read-only list of instructions

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect any existing connection and shutdown the daemon, the VpnService is not stopped but it is reset so new connections can be started.

      • startConnection

        public void startConnection(VpnProfile profile)
        Called when a connection is started. Sets the currently active VPN profile, resets IMC and Error state variables, sets the State to CONNECTING, increases the connection ID, and notifies all listeners. May be called from threads other than the main thread.
        Parameters:
        profile - current profile

      • setState

        public void setState(VpnStateService.State state)
        Update the state and notify all listeners, if changed. May be called from threads other than the main thread.
        Parameters:
        state - new state

      • setError

        public void setError(VpnStateService.ErrorState error)
        Set the current error state and notify all listeners, if changed. May be called from threads other than the main thread.
        Parameters:
        error - error state

      • setImcState

        public void setImcState(ImcState state)
        Set the current IMC state and notify all listeners, if changed. Setting the state to UNKNOWN clears all remediation instructions. May be called from threads other than the main thread.
        Parameters:
        error - error state

      • addRemediationInstruction

        public void addRemediationInstruction(RemediationInstruction instruction)
        Add the given remediation instruction to the internal list. Listeners are not notified. Instructions are cleared if the IMC state is set to UNKNOWN. May be called from threads other than the main thread.
        Parameters:
        instruction - remediation instruction
